name: multi-prompt
title: Multi Prompt
description: Prompt or open multiple links at once using a custom URL search query
author: edg

commands.name: prompt
commands.title: New Prompt
commands.subtitle: Open multiple links at once using a custom URL search query
commands.description: Open multiple links at once using a custom URL search query

commands.name: manage-urls
commands.title: Manage Urls
commands.subtitle: Add or remove links for Multi command
commands.description: Add or remove links for Multi command

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
